description:
'''Short description:'''
This Baltic Sea Biogeochemical Reanalysis product provides a biogeochemical reanalysis for the whole Baltic Sea area, inclusive the Transition Area to the North Sea, from January 1993 and up to minus 1-1.5 year compared to real time. The product is produced by using the biogeochemical model ERGOM one-way online-coupled with the ice-ocean model system Nemo. All variables are avalable as daily, monthly and annual means and include nitrate, phosphate, ammonium, dissolved oxygen, ph, chlorophyll-a, secchi depth, surface partial co2 pressure and net primary production. The data are available at the native model resulution (1 nautical mile horizontal resolution, and 56 vertical layers).

'''DOI (product) :'''

https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00012
title: Baltic Sea Biogeochemistry Reanalysis
